entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
